publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2156 Angus MacKay: Protection from Abuse (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Protection from Abuse (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*, Iain Gray*, Peter Peacock*
S1M-2156 Protection from Abuse (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution (lodged on 3 September 2001) Alasdair Morgan*
